latex:
Points $ A$ and $ B$ are on the parabola $ y = 4x^2 + 7x - 1$, and the origin is the midpoint of $ \overline{AB}$. What is the length of $ \overline{AB}$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2\sqrt5 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 5+\frac{\sqrt2}{2} \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 5+\sqrt2 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 7 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 5\sqrt2$
